TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void MouseEventHandler(object sender, MouseEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed MouseEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub MouseEventHandler(sender As Object, e As MouseEventArgs)
public delegate void MouseEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, MouseEventArgs ^ e);
type MouseEventHandler = delegate of obj * MouseEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件处理程序所附加到的对象。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示将处理与鼠标相关且不具体涉及鼠标按钮或鼠标滚轮的路由事件（如 ）的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle mouse related routed events that do not specifically involve mouse buttons or the mouse wheel; for example, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用下列附加事件使用此委托：This delegate is used with the following attached events: - - - - - - 此委托用于以下路由事件。This delegate is used with the following routed events. 这些路由的事件将转发前面列出的附加的事件，以使其更方便地访问中的常规元素模型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. - - - - - - - - 附加的事件和基元素路由事件共享其事件数据和浮升和隧道路由事件的版本也共享事件数据。The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data. 路由事件过程，这可能会影响事件的处理的特征。This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route. 有关详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 以外相关的所有路由事件，最值得关注的属性的属性可以在使用中的实现会公开当前的按钮状态，例如的多个属性和。Other than the properties that are relevant for all routed events, the most interesting properties of that you might use in a implementation are several properties that expose the current button state, such as and . 很有用，特别是因为您可以检查上它。 is useful particularly because you can check on it. 请注意，专门处理的鼠标按钮事件的事件使用不同的委托， 。Note that events that specifically deal with mouse button events use a different delegate, . 鼠标按钮属性位于以防输入的法或涉及按钮，即使您正处理非按钮事件的交互。The mouse button properties are available on in case there are input modes or interactions that involve the buttons even if you are handling a non-button event.
